Course Description.text: Development of language skills and cultural knowledge at the intermediate level.

GER2201 - Intermediate German Language a.name: GER2201 - Intermediate German Language and Civilization II

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Continuation of GER 2200 with emphasis on German civilization.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Grade of 'C' (2.0) or better in GER 2201

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Students will refine speaking and listening skills, build vocabulary, learn interactive communication strategies, and exercise critical thinking about contemporary issues in the German-speaking world.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Cultural development that shaped modern Germany. Students will read and discuss selected texts from different literary periods and view the influences they had on culture and daily life. Course conducted in German.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures

GER1120C - Elementary German Language an.name: GER1120C - Elementary German Language and Civilization I

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intro to German culture through major language skills: listening, speaking, reading and writing. Open only to students with no experience in this language.
